[[Image:Wildlifetrusts.png|thumb|right|The logo of the Wildlife Trusts]]'''The Wildlife Trusts Partnership''', or simply '''The Wildlife Trusts''', is a partnership of 47 local [[wildlife trust]]s in the [[United Kingdom]] plus the [[Isle of Man]] and [[Alderney]].
+
'''The Wildlife Trusts Partnership''', or simply '''The Wildlife Trusts''', is a partnership of 47 local [[wildlife trust]]s in the [[United Kingdom]] plus the [[Isle of Man]] and [[Alderney]].
The partnership's member trusts, between them, look after more than 2,200 [[nature reserve]]s covering 90,000 hectares. {{As of|2009}} they have a combined membership of 791,000 members.
The partnership's member trusts, between them, look after more than 2,200 [[nature reserve]]s covering 90,000 hectares. {{As of|2009}} they have a combined membership of 791,000 members.
